source.df6a4ca2:
embeddings_index = {}
with open('/kaggle/input/glove.6B.100d.txt','r') as f:
    for line in f:
        values=line.split()
        word=values[0]
        vectors=np.asarray(values[1:],'float32')
        embeddings_index[word]=vectors
f.close()
